message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $11,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal.  Let's see if we can close this deal.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,200 for your product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
